item.title: Problem with a server attacker

item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

is it hosted from your pc or not? because if you block pinging then it should stop lulz…

item.title: Problem with a server attacker
item.dc:creator: @The_Dark_Abbys The Dark Abbys
item.description:
@The_Dark_Abbys wrote:

Open your client.java

Search for if (playerName.startsWith("xero")

Then replace the xero with, SYIpk

Then replace the && !connectedFrom.equals("127.0.0.1")

With && connectedFrom.equals("PUTHISIPHERE")

And remove the part saying && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("xerozcheez")

This is not tested, but it is supposed to dissconect with a gfx, but he is not fully connected so im not sure

On the other hand for me it stoped lag, but it didnt stop the spamming of

Syipkpker… has logged in
etc

Read full topic
